title: Academic mentoring
subtitle: We do not yet know your best, but we are here to find it out and to make you aware of it.

paragraphs.normal1: Are you a Professor, post-Doc, Ph.D., or MA/BSc student? Do you feel competent and self-confident in what you do? Is Academic performance a piece of cake for you?
paragraphs.normal2: Then join our mentoring team to help Ukrainian students succeed!
paragraphs.normal4: Are you a new Ukrainian Ph.D., MA/BSc student at USI? Do you feel like you could need a bit of help with your classes?
paragraphs.normal5: Then register for our mentoring platform to receive the help you seek!
paragraphs.normal6: Those who have registered will be contacted as needed and networked with suited mentors.
